title: CHAMPIONS ARE RELOCKED
body: My friend gifted me Thresh and his dark star skin, after a while i came back to league and he's gone! WTF Rito?

replies.body: We're happy to help with this!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we can provide more context.  We'll respond asap!
